forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
